name: Meri 💉💉“Exiled for Good of the Realm” Williams

content.html: Honestly, I’ve been tempted for years to gather together a bunch of nerds with complex or chronic health challenges and have us define the appropriate micro format for medical records and then just start insistently getting everyone to provide API access to our info
content.value: Honestly, I’ve been tempted for years to gather together a bunch of nerds with complex or chronic health challenges and have us define the appropriate micro format for medical records and then just start insistently getting everyone to provide API access to our info
